articles.description: La ministre des Sports Amélie Oudéa-Castéra a déclaré ce mercredi à Franceinfo que le nombre de spectateurs pour la cérémonie d'ouverture des Jeux Olympiques 2024 à Paris était « en train d'être affiné ».

articles.title: Big Ten to hire Tony Petitti as next commissioner
articles.description: The Big Ten is expected to hire former MLB and television executive Tony Petitti, sources told ESPN, continuing the trend of nontraditional hires from outside the college sports space in the collegiate commissioner set.

articles.title: Michael Jordan's trainers sell for record $2.2m
articles.description: The sale seals the basketball titan's position as the most valuable athlete at sports memorabilia auctions.
articles.content:
A pair of trainers once worn by basketball legend Michael Jordan has sold for $2.2m (£1.7m) at auction, becoming the priciest shoes ever sold.
